name: Shmup - Zombie Game
description:
Name: Anik Barua

CS - UY 3113

Summary - I created a 2D zombie shooter game, where a player can shoot at zombies to get points. The player gets 3 lives in a game, and when a zombie damages the player it loses one life. There are coins that are worth 20 points and killing each zombie gives you 5 points. Player can use the spacebar to shoot and arrow-keys to move around. It is a competitive shooting game where the goal is to earn as much point as you want until the player dies.  

I used different triggers, colliders, sounds, visual effects and  made a simple UI in the form of score and health indicators. It is a complete game loop with title and game over screens and the player is given the option to play again. Also, there is an option to exit normally when the player presses the escape key to exit from full screen.
